Vos données, associées à l'identifiant [USER_ID], ont bien été exportées sur la base de données en ligne.

Vous pourrez donc les récupérer ultérieurement sur un autre appareil ou alors en cas de désinstallation de l'application grâce à votre identifiant unique.

tutorial_content:
Welcome to the Geozzle tutorial!

Click 'Next' to continue.
resources/images/tuto/home_en.jpg
Each game consists of six phases. During each phase, you will need to guess a country from a specific continent by gathering clues, such as the area, the flag, or the national anthem.
resources/images/tuto/game_en.jpg

The clues are divided into three categories: 1 star, 2 stars, and 3 stars.
The more stars a clue has, the more challenging it will be to guess the country, and thus the more points it will earn!
resources/images/tuto/clue_en.jpg

And the more clues you use, the more points you will lose!

Will you take on the challenge of trying to guess each country with as few clues as possible?
But be careful, you only have three lives to complete your game. Each wrong guess will cost you one life, along with valuable points.
resources/images/tuto/lose_life_en.jpg

Additionally, if you guess a country without losing any lives, you will receive a streak bonus.

Try to achieve a perfect streak to double your score!
resources/images/tuto/multipliers.jpg

Moreover, the lives you have left at the end of your game will earn you a few points each.

Aim to achieve the best score possible!
resources/images/tuto/end_game_en.jpg

Once you have completed a few games, you will have earned a certain number of points. You can go to the 'Gallery' menu to spend them on new backgrounds.

Collect them all!
resources/images/tuto/gallery_en.jpg

Finally, through the 'Statistics' menu, you can discover your best scores on each continent!

Will you manage to guess all the countries in the world?
resources/images/tuto/stats_en.jpg
And if you're a geography pro, will you be able to guess them all using only 3-stars clues?
resources/images/tuto/stats_3_en.jpg

Enjoy the game!

The LupaDevStudio Team
